name: Beetlemon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your green Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 green Digimon. [When Digivolving] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Hybrid] in its traits and 1 [J.P. Shibayama] among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
